title: (x) Logo and serif headline used in The Guardian - Guardian Egyptian {Jan E}
content:
Anyone know type used in Logo of this newspapers and type for main title

Tnx  
Mrki

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [the quardian.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022627/http:/typophile.com/files/the%20quardian.jpg) | 65.05 KB |
author: super_mrki

comments.content:
It’s custom designed for the relaunch of The Guardian in 2005.  
It’s called Guardian Eyptian, designed by Christian Schwartz and Paul Barnes.

Read all about it here:  
 [http://www.newsdesigner.com/archives/cat\_guardian\_relaunch.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022627/http:/www.newsdesigner.com/archives/cat_guardian_relaunch.php "http://www.newsdesigner.com/archives/cat\_guardian\_relaunch.php")

Custom.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/30873](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022627/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30873 "http://www.typophile.com/node/30873")

Try a search next time - this comes up a lot.

I think it's all custom.

It's been discussed on here berfore. Here's one [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330022627/http:/dev.typophile.com/node/33231).

Yes, tnx

I did search after I posted... Faster hand than mind...

Tnx a lot

\> _I did search after I posted... Faster hand than mind..._

Well, if you do it _before_, it saves us from answering the same questions over and over and over... ;^)
